tasks.task: Driving or operating a farm vehicle
subtasks: Sitting in the operator's seat
Adjusting the seat and mirrors for optimal visibility
Starting the vehicle and shifting gears
Operating the steering to navigate around fields
Using the brakes to come to a halt safely
Manipulating the control levers for attachments like plows or cultivators
Monitoring the progress and adjusting as necessary while in motion
Walking through the fields to assess crop health
Checking for signs of pests or diseases
Noting areas that may require additional attention, like irrigation or fertilization
Calculating the required amount of fertilizer
Loading the fertilizer onto the vehicle or applicator
Applying the fertilizer evenly to the fields
Ensuring coverage across the entire area
Setting up the planter equipment
Loading the seed or other planting material
Driving the planter through the fields, controlling the depth and spacing
Ensuring proper planting and adjusting as needed
Activating the harvesting machine
Guiding the harvester through the crops
Collecting the harvested material into bins or trailers
Transporting the harvested crops to storage or processing facilities
